author: makortel
body:
This PR provides the following updates to `TrackingNtuple`
- add link from seeds to tracks
- add link from vertex to tracks (for tracks used in the vertex fit)
- add track invalid hits
- add all SimHits
  - add TrackingParticle <-> SimHit links
  - add SimHit <-> RecHit links
  - remove TrackingParticle <-> RecHit links
  - Notes
    - SimHits with `particleType()` electron from non-electron TrackingParticles are filtered out (delta rays, to make the interpretation of sim information a bit easier)
    - SimHits for pileup events require running `MixingModule` in "playback mode" to access SimHits from pileup events
- new branches for tracks
  - track parameters
  - track reference point
- new branches for TrackingParticles
  - parameters at PCA as in MTV
- add subdetector part of DetId also to pixel hits
- add a flag whether a pixel/strip hit is from signal/in-time pileup/out-of-time pileup/noise

In addition, code for analysis of fake tracks (by Jyri Maanp, summer student) is added as an additional example.

Tested in 8_1_0_pre12, expecting no effect on standard workflows.

@rovere @VinInn
title: Update tracking ntuple
